channel.title: Help Me Please [READ]
channel.description:
Okay guys i got corp and i was wondering how can i make it attack in a style so i could pray that and he would hit 0s bcuz he hits through melee
any1 know how to fix?

item.title: Help Me Please [READ]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

Its easy use NPCHandler.java open it up and search for this

Melee

You should see a bunch of stuff like this

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 655 && plr.ProtMelee == false){

now hit enter under one of those true; or false; statements and type this in

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == CORPORAL BEAST'S NPC ID HERE && plr.ProtMelee == true) { hitDiff = 0;

Your probly gona have to Modify this code because this is for my delta base.

Read full topic
